scripts.g:t: npm run gulp:clean && npm run gulp:transpile
scripts.g:t:d: npm run gulp:clean && npm run gulp:transpile:debug
scripts.g:t:r: npm run gulp:clean && npm run gulp:transpile && gulp -f ./bin/gulpfile.js
scripts.g:experiment:1: echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> Current directory is : [$(pwd)] . >>>>> " && npm run g:t:d && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm' && npx nodemon --watch 'src/**/*' -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node ./src/gulpfile.ts && echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> [$(pwd)] . >>>>> "
scripts.g:experiment:2: echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> Current directory is : [$(pwd)] . >>>>> " && npm run g:t:d && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --input-type=module' && npx nodemon --watch 'src/**/*' -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node ./src/gulpfile.ts && echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> [$(pwd)] . >>>>> "
scripts.g:experiment:3: echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> Current directory is : [$(pwd)] . >>>>> " && npm run g:t:d && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --input-type=module' && node --no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --input-type=module ./bin/gulpfile.js && echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> [$(pwd)] . >>>>> "
scripts.g:experiment:4: echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> Current directory is : [$(pwd)] . >>>>> " && npm run g:t:d && npm run g:copy:json && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --input-type=module' && node --no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm ./bin/gulpfile.js && echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> [$(pwd)] . >>>>> "
scripts.g:experiment:5: echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> Current directory is : [$(pwd)] . >>>>> " && npm run g:t:d && npm run g:copy:json && npm run g:gen:mjs && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --input-type=module' && node --no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm ./bin/gulpfile.mjs && echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> [$(pwd)] . >>>>> "
scripts.g:experiment:6: echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> Current directory is : [$(pwd)] . >>>>> " && npm run g:t:d && npm run g:copy:json && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm' && node --no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm ./bin/gulpfile.js && echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> [$(pwd)] . >>>>> "
scripts.g:r:6: echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> Current directory is : [$(pwd)] . >>>>> " && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm' && node --no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm ./bin/gulpfile.js && echo " >>> POKUS >>>> just checking >>> [$(pwd)] . >>>>> "
